name: Heroism, Greater
book: Pathfinder Roleplaying Game Mythic Adventures © 2013, Paizo Publishing, LLC
text: This spell functions like heroism, except the creature gains a +4 morale bonus on attack rolls, saves, and skill checks, immunity to fear effects, and temporary hit points equal to your caster level (maximum 20).
text_zh: 该法术的功能如同‘英雄气概 (heroism)’一般，不过生物的攻击检定、豁免和技能检定会获得+4士气加值，同时免疫恐惧效果，并获得等同于你的CL的临时HP (最多20点)。
